place.name: WHITTON
place.gazetteerText: WHITTON, a parish in Presteigne district, Radnor; 3½ miles SW by S of Knighton r. station. Post town, Presteigne, Radnorshire. Acres, 1,549. Real property, £1,060. Pop., 115. Houses, 24. The property is not much divided. The living is a rectory in the diocese of St. Davids. Value, £126.* Patron, the Bishop of St. D. The church is tolerable. (In 1870-72, John Marius Wilson's Imperial Gazetteer of England and Wales)
